APPLY-TO-ALL.TEXT-ONE-SHIPMENT: {{title}} has been applied to one other shipment!
APPLY-TO-ALL.TEXT: {{title}} has been applied to {{shipmentApplied}} other shipments!

COMMENT-SENT.TITLE: Thank you for your comments.
COMMENT-SENT.TEXT: Your comments are now being reviewed by our DHL Express Customs team. If any further action is required, we will reach out to you again.

SUCCESS-ALERT-MESSAGE.TITLE: Thank you for your submission!
SUCCESS-ALERT-MESSAGE.TEXT: Your details are now being reviewed by our Customs team. If any further action is required, we will  reach out to you again.

INFORMATION-BLOCK.DESCRIPTION: DHL requires more information from you for the shipments indicated here before we can submit for Customs Clearance.
INFORMATION-BLOCK.TITLE: Perfect Your Shipment

VIRUS-ERRORS.TITLE: File Upload Issue
VIRUS-ERRORS.BODY: A virus was detected in {{fileNames}}. Please check the file(s) and try again.

TOO-MANY-SHIPMENTS.BODY: The maximum number of shipments you can Apply your requirement to is {{ESB_max_configuration}}. Please select a smaller number of files and try again.
TOO-MANY-SHIPMENTS.TITLE: Apply To All Limit Exceeded

LOADER.TITLE: Processing Submissionâ€¦
LOADER.BODY: Please do not close, refresh or leave this page while we process your information.

ERRORS.TITLE: We are sorry!
ERRORS.BODY: Due to technical difficulties, we are unable to submit your information. Please try again later or Contact Us.

SIR-SUBMIT-MODAL.LABEL-CONSENT: I confirm that all of the information I provided is accurate and valid for the purpose of submission to Customs authorities.
SIR-SUBMIT-MODAL.TEXTAREA-FORMAT-HINT: Please enter reason for Incomplete submission or other comments

FILE-MIME-ERRORS.BODY: The file extension(s) of the following file(s) are invalid: {{fileNames}}. Please fix their extensions and try again.
FILE-MIME-ERRORS.TITLE: File Extension(s) Invalid

UNSCANNABLE-FILES.TITLE: Password Protected File(s) Detected
UNSCANNABLE-FILES.BODY: You cannot upload the following password protected file(s): {{fileNames}}. Please try again after removing password protection.

APPLY-TO-ALL.LABEL: Apply your {{title}} to your remaining shipments

ASK-REDIRECT-MODAL.TITLE: Do you want to leave or refresh this page?
ASK-REDIRECT-MODAL.DESCRIPTION: Changes you made will be lost.

GENERAL-INFORMATION.TITLE: This shipment needs additional details.
GENERAL-INFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: DHL requires more information from you for this shipment before we can submit for Customs Clearance.

CALL-US.TITLE: Call Us
CALL-US.DESCRIPTION: Questions and support from our DHL Customs Clearance Support Team.

ERRORS.DATE_PICKER_FUTURE: The selected date must be in the future.

ERRORS.COMMENT_TEXT_AREA_EXACT_LENGTH: Your Comments should be exactly {{length}} characters.

ERRORS.COMMENT_TEXT_AREA_MIN_LENGTH: Your Comments should have at least {{length}} characters.
ERRORS.COMPOSITE_ANY_OF: Please complete at least one of the following fields {{list}}

ERRORS.TEXT_AREA_MAX_LENGTH: {{title}} should not have more than {{length}} characters.
ERRORS.STRING_TEXT_FIELD_MIN_LENGTH: {{sirTitle}} should not be less than {{length}} characters.
ERRORS.FILE_UPLOADER_ZERO_FILE_SIZE: The size of the uploaded file is 0KB. Please upload a larger file.
ERRORS.STRING_TEXT_FIELD_MAX_LENGTH: {{sirTitle}} should not be more than {{length}} characters.
ERRORS.TEXT_AREA_REGEX: Your comment cannot contain only special characters.
ERRORS.TECHNICAL_DIFFICULTIES: We are experiencing technical difficulties. Please try again later or Contact Us.
ERRORS.FILE_UPLOADER_FILE_SIZE: The total size of all files uploaded must be less than {{fileSize}}.
ERRORS.COMMENT_TEXT_AREA_REGEX: Your Comments cannot contain only special characters.
ERRORS.NUMBER_TEXT_FIELD_MAX_LENGTH: {{title}} should not have more than {{length}} digits.
ERRORS.COMMENT_TEXT_AREA_MAX_LENGTH: Your Comments should not have more than {{length}} characters.
ERRORS.DATE_PICKER_PAST: The selected date must be in the past.
ERRORS.COMPOSITE_ONE_OF: Please complete exactly one of the following fields: {{list}}
ERRORS.DATE_PICKER_FUTURE_CURRENT: The selected date must not be in the past.
ERRORS.COMMENT_TEXT_AREA_BETWEEN_LENGTH: Your Comments should have between {{minLength}} and {{maxLength}} characters.
ERRORS.DATE_PICKER_PAST_CURRENT: The selected date must not be in the future.
